name: Umuada Igbo Cultural Association
description: A women's group dedicated to preserving Igbo traditions and empowering communities through cultural education and events.

name: Igbo Masquerade Guild
description: A guild of traditional masquerade performers showcasing vibrant Igbo festivals and dances.

name: Omenala Artisans
description: Artisans creating traditional Igbo sculptures, beads, and textiles, preserving ancient craftsmanship.

name: Igbo Heritage Foundation
description: A foundation focused on preserving Igbo history, language, and artifacts through research and exhibitions.

name: Mmanwu Cultural Troupe
description: A troupe specializing in Igbo masquerade performances, promoting cultural storytelling.

name: Igbo Language Institute
description: An institute dedicated to teaching and preserving the Igbo language and oral traditions.

name: Ozo Title Holders Association
description: An association of traditional Igbo title holders promoting cultural governance and heritage.
